name: Yakuza 6: Song of Life - Clan Creator Card Bundle
summary: Six yakuza legends swear into your Clan Creator family, the tower defense game within Yakuza 6! Includes the SSR creator cards Daigo Dojima, Goro Majima, Kazuma Kiryu, Makoto Date, Shun Akiyama and Taiga Saejima, plus yen and experience boosts for the main game.
